dmca.title: [XILO Ticket #18284]: frozenweb.co.uk - DMCA
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: XILO Abuse [mailto:abuse@xilo.net] 
Posted At: Monday, July 03, 2006 8:28 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [XILO Ticket #18284]: frozenweb.co.uk - DMCA
Subject: [XILO Ticket #18284]: frozenweb.co.uk - DMCA


Dear ThePlanet.

This letter should be accepted as my digital signature as Director of
XILO (UK) Ltd.

The works on the following pages have been stolen, altered and published
on a server hosted at your location;

http://www.frozenweb.co.uk/uk-web-hosting.php
http://www.frozenweb.co.uk/templates.php
http://www.frozenweb.co.uk/fantastico.php
http://www.frozenweb.co.uk/contact.php

Our details are as follows

XILO (UK) Ltd
97 Jet Centro
Sheffield
S2 4AU
UK

01143030050
abuse@xilo.net

The publisher has no authority to use the material in question and has
never been granted and permission previously. 

The information located in this email is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, I am authorized to act as the owner of an exclusive right that
is allegedly infringed.

We have taken a copy of their site in static image format for legal
reasons and also copies of our site from the same period.

Awaiting your reply.

Thank you

Abuse
--
Email via our helpdesk.
